sentences.en: A bulbous plant ( Narcissus pseudonarcissus ) having showy, usually yellow flowers with a trumpet - shaped central crown.
sentences.cn: 黄水仙一种球茎状的植物 ( 黄水仙水仙属 ),开有艳丽的, 通常为黄色的花和喇叭状的花冠.

sentences.en: Borneo monkey having a long bulbous nose.
sentences.cn: 有球状长鼻的婆罗洲猴子.

sentences.en: Bulbous cactus is drought - enduring and will not wither even without water for half a month.
sentences.cn: 仙人球挺耐旱,半个月不浇水也不会枯死.

sentences.en: Bulbous: Resembling a bulb in shape; rounded or swollen.
sentences.cn: 鳞茎状的: 形状象鳞茎的; 圆形的或鼓胀的.

sentences.en: Design travelers will dig the big, bulbous lamps that hang from the ceiling over leather seats and carefully-placed table settings.
sentences.cn: 这些设计使得游客会欣赏那些大大的从天花板垂下并悬于皮椅之上的球根状灯饰和精心设计的餐桌摆设。

sentences.en: He has a huge, bulbous nose.
Mexican bulbous herb cultivated for its handsome bright red solitary flower.
sentences.cn: 墨西哥的一种球根状草本植物,为其漂亮而又鲜红的单花而栽培.
北美洲的一种球茎植物.

sentences.en: North Atlantic beaked whale with a bulbous forehead.
sentences.cn: 北美洲前额程球根状的突吻鲸.

sentences.en: Over a kilometer long, their bulbous oblong hulls cast shadows over the entire field.
sentences.cn: 超过一公里长, 他们球根状的椭圆船体投下的阴影覆盖了整个战场.

sentences.en: Results: 16 cases were anterior urethral injures, 9 bulbous urethral injury, and 10 posterior urethral injuries.
sentences.cn: 结果: 前尿道损伤16例, 球部损伤占9例,后尿道损伤10例.

sentences.en: So the spiral of a compact florescent bulb isn't bulbous at all.
sentences.cn: 而螺旋形的节能荧光灯泡并不是鳞茎状的.

sentences.en: The stem is of bulbous bow type constructed by welded of steel plates.
sentences.cn: 艏部是钢板焊接球鼻形结构.

sentences.en: We were so thick like that in everything. " -- he held up two bulbous fingers ---- " always together. "
sentences.cn: 我们俩在一切方面都像这样亲密, ” 他举起了两个肥胖的 指头, “ 永远在一起. ”

words.tran_cn: 生球茎；膨胀成球状（bulb的过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 球根的，球根状的，球根长成的
